channel.title: CVE Feed for Microsoft -- Microsoft Visual Studio
channel.description: The latest CVEs for Microsoft -- Microsoft Visual Studio

item.title: CVE-2018-8232|2024-08-05T06:46:13.840Z -- microsoft -- microsoft%20visual%20studio
item.description: A Tampering vulnerability exists when Microsoft Macro Assembler improperly validates code, aka "Microsoft Macro Assembler Tampering Vulnerability." This affects Microsoft Visual Studio.

item.title: CVE-2018-8172|2024-08-05T06:46:13.505Z -- microsoft -- microsoft%20visual%20studio
item.description: A remote code execution vulnerability exists in Visual Studio software when the software does not check the source markup of a file for an unbuilt project, aka "Visual Studio Remote Code Execution Vulnerability." This affects Microsoft Visual Studio, Expression Blend 4.

item.title: CVE-2018-1037|2024-08-05T03:44:11.975Z -- microsoft -- microsoft%20visual%20studio
item.description: An information disclosure vulnerability exists when Visual Studio improperly discloses limited contents of uninitialized memory while compiling program database (PDB) files, aka "Microsoft Visual Studio Information Disclosure Vulnerability." This affects Microsoft Visual Studio.

item.title: CVE-2018-8599|2024-08-05T07:02:25.956Z -- microsoft -- microsoft%20visual%20studio
item.description: An elevation of privilege vulnerability exists when the Diagnostics Hub Standard Collector Service improperly impersonates certain file operations, aka "Diagnostics Hub Standard Collector Service Elevation of Privilege Vulnerability." This affects Microsoft Visual Studio, Windows Server 2019, Windows Server 2016, Windows 10, Windows 10 Servers.
